title: Buy a Contract Receive
description: A message with transaction results is received

balance_after.description: The new account balance after completion of the purchase

shortcode.description: Compact description of the contract purchased

start_time.description: Epoch value showing the expected start time of the contract

purchase_time.description: Epoch value of the transaction purchase time

amount_per_point.description: [For spread contracts only] Amount per point

stop_profit_level.description: [For spread contracts only] Stop profit level (spot plus/minus stop profit amount)

stop_loss_level.description: [For spread contracts only] Stop loss level (spot plus/minus stop loss amount)

req_id.description: Optional field send in request to map to response, present only when request contains req_id
